title: I'm About To Just Start Naming People From My Matches Who Need Banned.
body:
Seriously, I'm so tired of dealing with other people's shit and having to mute entire teams match after match. 

Bronze on my other account, with 1700 MMR, playing against Silver 2 to Gold 3 players... and all I hear are complaints about everything I do, the champion I'm picking, the items I'm buying, the keystones I'm using. HATE SPEECH and Verbal Abuse towards me game in and game out.

I literally wish a Rioter would just monitor the players that I'm playing with, and literally ban permanently on site all of these players who are making these comments.

It's hard enough playing this damn game against 5 enemy players, let alone when you have another 4 enemies on your team every single time you play.

replies.body: Please don't. It is against board rules, and I really don't like to have to take action against an individual's board account. I understand it's frustrating to have abusive players, but the report system *does* work, so keep muting + reporting them.

Sure doesn't work. And this guy is in the same boat as a lot of others. Riot is losing players on a nominal basis because they are more than happy to ban 1 person reported by 4 trolls than ban 4 trolls who were harassing 1 person. Yeah I'm not a shining example of a good player, maybe even what i'd say is average, but the reporting system is flawed and the community has devolved into a toxic mess. I've ready the forums and there's hundreds of cases where, even though the person wasn't always right in there actions/comments, its clear they were being harassed and trolled. I've been the victim of this too. In my day job I have to make decisions that have to be based on a moral compass, I hope that as a professional you would be able to do the same. By the way, have a look at ALL my chat logs, not just what I said. I don't need to be unbanned or anything, but maybe you will see what I mean.

> [{quoted}](name=Heavensflame86,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=aAnEOacY,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2019-01-12T19:07:31.435+0000)...even though the person wasn't always right in there actions/comments, its clear they were being harassed and trolled.

Yep! Not saying the harassing/trolling behavior is okay -- those players should be (and usually are) subjected to the system themselves based on their behavior. It doesn't, however, justify an individual breaking the rules in response.
I wouldn't recommend doing that, as naming and shaming is against Boards rules.

> [{quoted}](name=KFCeytron,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=aAnEOacY,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-01-11T10:12:50.355+0000)
>
> I wouldn't recommend doing that, as naming and shaming is against Boards rules.

I don't care, if they aren't banning these people for being complete assholes in-game they have no right to ban anyone for anything anywhere.

> [{quoted}](name=Rainbow Slayer,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=aAnEOacY,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-01-11T10:16:45.309+0000)
>
> I don't care, if they aren't banning these people for being complete assholes in-game they have no right to ban anyone for anything anywhere.

So you think cause others are breaking rules, you should be also? Just mute, report the behavior and move on.
I mean, there are punishments out there besides game bans; like chat restrictions.

> ...if they aren't banning these people for being complete assholes in-game they have no right to ban anyone for anything anywhere.

First of all, that's not how anything works, anywhere. Even if the players who flamed you somehow didn't get a punishment (which is incredibly unlikely), that doesn't suddenly mean that no rules have meaning and all of them should be broken regardless of what they are.

Second, you don't _see_ them getting banned/punished, so you're simply assuming that they just don't. That, again, is not how anything works. You're not going to get perfectly clear feedback telling you "so-and-so player got punished/banned! good job!" - hell, you're unlikely to even see "a player you reported got punished".

So unless you've got some extraneous, out-of-the-way method of proving without a shadow of a doubt that they _didn't_ get punished...You're only left to assume.

> I don't care...

I imagine you would care if you wound up getting yourself a Boards ban. For your own sake, if nobody else's, just follow the rules, dude.

What?

And what would naming people do aside from literally nothing?
Might want to take a breather.  Take a break from the game.  Explore other games.

> [{quoted}](name=zPOOPz,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=aAnEOacY,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-01-11T10:21:35.491+0000)
>
> Might want to take a breather.  Take a break from the game.  Explore other games.

I don't need a breather man, I'm doing just fine. Went 15/5/7 and 12/3/5 against players who ranked higher than I am even on my main. However, I do not appreciate one bit playing with a bunch of ungrateful babies who just want to complain about everyone and everything the entire match, and then start throwing insults around at their teammates.

It's not a one match thing. I keep dealing with this EVERY SINGLE MATCH.
It's a serious problem that needs addressed. Riot needs to stop shrugging it off and trying to pretend it's not a common thing.

If I have to start recording and uploading all the shit these people are saying, in every single one of my games, and put it on blast everywhere then I most definitely will. The system is not doing a good enough job and it needs addressed by Riot.

yeahhhh...time to breathe little fella, take a break, you're clearly tilted

btw what would naming them here do? no one here has banning powers

Lol i have a friend like that. He continuously picks stupid runes and combinations of items and everything. Then he gets flamed and loses constantly. Still bronze after 5 years of playing. But he NEVER learns to stop doing stupid builds. He literally defends them to me as I tell him its bad. And then im like thats why people hate you every other game man. Yet he continues to do it.... i have no sympathy for him. 

You should maybe reflect on some of your choices. My friend does shit like caitlyn top lane and then gets flamed... like duh. Are you going super off meta alot? Ive never had problems with flame, so if it happens to you EVERY GAME, you might want to do a little introspective analysis. You know? There has to be some factor thats causing this. Im not insulting you or accusing you of anything. Do you complain in chat a lot? Do you respond to negativity in chat? Just trying to think of things people dont like that causes or perpetuates toxicity.

Uhhh what? Not sure if this is in reference to me, but I'm ranking up my account which got placed in Iron 4 due to the new changes. I'm playing at Gold 3 MMR, and I currently have a 62% total win rate and almost an 80% win rate on the champion that I'm playing with more than 20 matches.

If you wanna reference that and "stupid builds" together then be my guest, but I'm not having any struggles of my own whatsoever. The only reason I am even making this post, is because I'm tired of having to mute my teammates every single match. It's demoralizing to see the negative shit spewing from these people, like them calling me trash because I don't gank for them in the first 5 minutes of the match, when they've died 3 times already due to bad trades.

Players in this game need to learn how to keep their finger off the enter button and just play the game. I'm trying my best for teams full of players who are just standing around in base typing negative garbage towards myself and others and it's beyond frustrating. It's really shitty when  I'm coming to gank and my teammate is standing around eating loads of damage, because they're standing still typing about how bad I am, then end up dying before I can even get there.

Riot needs to hammer down on players much more than they have been. Believe me, I'm no "soft" player, and I don't mind a little trash talking from time to time. What's been happening in my matches however is beyond trash talking, it's needless harassment that shouldn't be tolerated.
Putting peoples names on here out of frustration is just gonna hurt you even more. Just saying.{{sticker:sg-lulu}}
